0010011111110001 0100110101101000 0 -> sum: 0111010101011001, cout: 0
0100101110000001 1100100101101110 0 -> sum: 0001010011101111, cout: 1
1000100101100100 1011101111011100 1 -> sum: 0100010101000001, cout: 1
1010110000000011 0100110100110011 1 -> sum: 1111100100110111, cout: 0
0101011011101100 0101111111000011 0 -> sum: 1011011010101111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
